snippet: This is the time of year when interest in professional sports heats up, with a young baseball season, the start of the N.B.A. and N.H.L. playoffs, and the wind-up to the N.F.L. draft. Web sites offer mobile access to everything from commentary to...
lead_paragraph: This is the time of year when interest in professional sports heats up, with a young baseball season, the start of the N.B.A. and N.H.L. playoffs, and the wind-up to the N.F.L. draft. Web sites offer mobile access to everything from commentary to streaming video.
